column3: Guntmar could really use a pick-me-up.
Slay a muud suud for its horn.
Deliver the muud suud horn to Guntmar.
Fancy meeting you here in a place like this. I could actually use a bit of help from a capable adventurer such as yourself.
Keeping watch up all by my lonesome is surprisingly tiresome work. Lately I haven't been able to keep focused, and I nod off at the strangest times of the day.
If you could bring me a single horn from the muud suuds over near Goodblade, it would help me immensely.
All I need is a single horn from the muud suuds around Goodblade. Should prove easy for an adventurer like you, right?
Did you have any trouble getting the horn?
Perfect. This is just what I needed to put the spring back in my step.

I was initially assigned to this post because of a passing familiarity with the land, but I've a few other tricks most folks don't know about. Like grinding these horns into a powder, then mixing it in boiling water. It's good for you, and has a kick that really wakes you up.

You know, with so few resources to get by on here in the mountains, it sometimes amazes me how we've managed to survive as long as we have. I suppose you could say it's a testament to the value of the knowledge and skills our forebears have passed down through the generations.
Ahem. Sorry about that. It's been so long since I've had anyone to talk to up here. Thanks again for your help.
